title: Mel B gets lubed-up hot dog stuck between her legs on Celebrity Juice
text:
To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video

Mel B is certainly game for any task put in front of her but even she got a shocker during the latest banister task on Celebrity Juice.

The raunchy game show, fronted by Keith Lemon, asked the Spice Girl to be blindfolded and slide down a lubed-up banister in order to guess what a mystery item glued to it.

Naturally, these things are all pretty phallic looking in nature, and poor Mel got a hot dog up her bum for her efforts.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Mel looked horrified as she slid down the greasy game show pole and over the mustard and ketchup sodden sausage that Keith and Cold Feet’s John Thompson had gaffa-taped to the railing.

‘This is so inappropriate!,’ she wailed – and that was before she even started the game!

As Will Mellor and Adam Lambert looked on horrified, team captain Mel took one quite literally for the team in order to score themselves some points.

You’ve got to hand it to her – she gave it her all!

Mel had to ride over the hot dog on the greased-up banister (Picture: ITV/Fremantle)

This is a Spice Girl, Keith! Have some decorum.

Mel is facing off against Holly Willoughby as the new team captain on the x-rated ITV2 series, which has proven in the past to laugh in the face of propriety.

The show puts celebs in some seriously awkward positions which often have sexual innuendo built in as standard.

Sometimes though, it’s all in the name of gross-out humour – with Mel nearly being sick as James Blunt downed a pint of cottage cheese last week.

More: Mel B Mel B 'had wild fling' with James Arthur after meeting on America's Got Talent Holly Willoughby shoved fist in Mel B to win savage Celebrity Juice game James Blunt attempts to crawl through naked man's legs but bumps into his manhood

Mel and Holly have proven to be worthy adversaries over the past couple of weeks, and speaking to Metro.co.uk leading man Keith admitted that things sometimes get nasty as they’re both so competitive.

Advertisement

Advertisement

‘They’re so competitive, both of them, so competitive, but that’s what makes great TV. And me just winding up Mel B all the time,’ Keith said, adding that one test game called Box Mountain ended up with Holly Willoughby’s fist in Mel B’s mouth.

Celebrity Juice airs Thursdays at 10pm on ITV2.

description: Mel B was tasked with riding down the greased up bannister over a hot dog for Celebrity Juice - and things get messy
